tag_professor: Respected (1)  Tough Grader (1)  Gives good feedback (1)
comments: He gave several real life applications in boiler system installation and repair that he has run into over the years. Pay close attention when he covers system equipment selection and pipe sizing and you will do well. He will stay after class if you have any questions to make sure you understand the material. Overall high quality instructor.

tag_professor: Respected (1)  Tough Grader (1)  Gives good feedback (1)
comments: Alderman teaches very clearly. He gives practical examples that will better prepare you to be an HVAC tech. He\'s also friendly and approachable.

tag_professor: Respected (1)  Tough Grader (1)  Gives good feedback (1)
comments: He knows the Air Conditioning & Refrig. trade inside and out. Very helpful, easy to understand. Always asks if everyone understands the material being covered. Doesn\'t mind going over material again. Reviews you before your tests. You will know the Air Conditioning & Refrigeration cycles (with ease) by the end of the semester. Awsome instructor!
